CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleEntityMapChangedEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local NewMap = event.NewMap local OldMap = event.OldMap local Entity = event.Entity local Timer = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DefaultGroup/TimeUI") --------------------------------------------------------
if (NewMap.Id=="68b7c298-1965-44f3-b11d-df9ef7f265aa") then --치우기Lv1 self.Entity.TimeScript.time = 90 Timer:SetEnable(true)
elseif (NewMap.Id=="5dbd6f22-ed0e-47fb-8171-ad2970b3054e") then --치우기Lv2 self.Entity.TimeScript.time = 90 Timer:SetEnable(true)
elseif (NewMap.Id=="75e3dd60-119a-4484-8afa-78b83005157b") then --치우기Lv3 self.Entity.TimeScript.time = 100 Timer:SetEnable(true)
elseif (NewMap.Id=="165bb027-2d9c-47b6-8aab-a88c13327d76") then --찾기lv1 self.Entity.TimeScript.time = 60 Timer:SetEnable(true)
elseif (NewMap.Id=="84885290-bd81-452c-b448-9a24718afbca") then --찾기lv2 self.Entity.TimeScript.time = 90 Timer:SetEnable(true)
elseif (NewMap.Id=="8936e44e-8648-4f1f-b856-2726348231d5") then --찾기lv3 self.Entity.TimeScript.time = 150 Timer:SetEnable(true)
else Timer:SetEnable(false) end
